text:
San Francisco, CA (Financial District) - SeatMe

SeatMe is hiring! We're a cozy 15 person restaurant reservation startup that is passionate about food in downtown San Francisco and we need your help! We're in search of:

  * iOS developers (Objective-C for iPad and iPhone)
We offer a very competitive salary, benefits, moving costs, equity options, regular company dinners at restaurants around SF, catered lunches and an awesome friendly culture for all full-time employees.

http://www.seatme.com/jobs/ or email jordan@seatme.com!
